text: Margaret Taylor may refer to: *Margaret Taylor (1788–1852), wife of Zachary Taylor and First Lady of the United States from 1849 to 1850 *Margaret Young Taylor (1837–1919), American leader in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter- day Saints *Margaret L. Curry (born Taylor, 1898–1986), American state parole officer and medical social worker *Peggy Taylor (1912–2002), American singer and television announcer *Peg Taylor (cricketer) (1917–2004), New Zealand cricketer *Peggy Taylor (spy) (1920–2006), French World War II spy *Peggy Taylor (EastEnders), a character from EastEnders ==See also== *Margaret Taylor-Burroughs, American artist and writer
title: Margaret Taylor (disambiguation)
